entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 a.m. EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
